Description.Name: Basic Attack: Swift Strike
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 3 attacks forward, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Leaping Strike
Description.Desc:
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Leap forward and unleash a series of slashes, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge: Reversal Shot
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: First Strike Advantage
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Dash forward and slash, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Relentless Retribution
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Thrust at enemies in front, then follow up with a swift slash, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Rending Claw
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Perform a rapid back-and-forth piercing attack, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Rending Claw - Nightmare Shadow
Description.Desc:
While Pulchra is in the <color=#FFFFFF>Hunter's Gait</color> state, and when another active character in the squad hits an enemy with a heavy attack from a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>:
Dash back-and-forth piercing enemies surrounding the target, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
After using this skill, if another active character in the squad hits an enemy, Pulchra will repeat the attack up to 5 additional times, with the final attack being a more powerful Finishing Move.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
<color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Rending Claw - Nightmare Shadow</color> is an <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> attack.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Rending Claw - Flashstep
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Pierce back and forth times, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Rending Claw - Nightmare Shadow
EX Special Attack: Rending Claw - Flashstep
Chain Attack: Hey, Didn't Expect That, Right?
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a charged shot forward, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Oh, Time to Play?
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleash a powerful shot at enemies in a large area ahead, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Hey, Didn't Expect That, Right?
Quick Assist: Contract - Bodyguard
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Thrust at enemies in front, followed by rapid slashes, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Evasive Assist: Contract - Outsourced Combat
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Dodges the enemy's attack and activates <color=#FFFFFF>Vital View</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Independent Pricing
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after an <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color> to activate:
Leap forward into the air and fire, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Upon activating this skill, consume 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Point</color> to enter the <color=#FFFFFF>Hunter's Gait</color> state.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1351004.Name: EX Special Attack: Rending Claw - Flashstep

1351007.Name: Chain Attack: Hey, Didn't Expect That, Right?

Name: Core Passive: Hunter's Instinct
Additional Ability: Business Partner
Desc: When Pulchra activates an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, she enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Hunter's Gait</color> state, increasing the Daze she deals by <color=#2BAD00>15%</color> for 6s. After switching to another character, if Pulchra is still in the <color=#FFFFFF>Hunter's Gait</color> state, the state will last until Pulchra switches back in. While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Hunter's Gait</color> state and as the active character, when Pulchra lands a heavy attack on enemies, she can trigger a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> from the previous character in the squad.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Attack</color> character or shares the same Faction:
When Pulchra hits enemies with <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Rending Claw - Nightmare Shadow</color>, an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, it applies the <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Trap</color> effect for 15s. After applying <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Trap</color>, all units' <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> DMG against the target is increased by 30%.

1.Name: Self-Interest
1.Desc: When dealing DMG to enemies affected by <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Trap</color>, increase own CRIT Rate by 10%.

2.Name: Opportunistic
2.Desc: While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Hunter's Gait</color> state from <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Hunter's Instinct</color>, Pulchra's ATK is increased by an additional 10%.

4.Name: Joy of the Hunt
4.Desc: Reduces Energy Cost of activating <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Rending Claw - Flashstep</color> by 5.

6.Name: Behind the Mask
6.Desc: <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Rending Claw - Nightmare Shadow's</color> DMG is increased by 15%, and the number of times the repeated attack can trigger is increased by 2. <color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability: Business Partner</color>'s <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Trap</color> effect now also applies to all damage types, not just <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> DMG.
